wikipedia_page.main: Luke Dean (21 June 1913 – 1975) was an English footballer who played as a forward for Port Vale and Northwich Victoria.

response: Dean moved to Ossett Town on loan in March 2011 but was recalled a month later by new Bradford City manager Peter Jackson. Luke Dean was the only player of the 2011 Bradford City out of contract players to be handed a new contract, which would keep him at the club until at least June 2012.
Luke Dean is the name of:
*Luke Dean (footballer, born 1913), English professional footballer who played for Port Vale
*Luke Dean (footballer, born 1991), English professional footballer who plays for Harrogate Town
